_header: John blesses them all that this book readen
_description: Eighteen lines of verse accompanying the Latin text of the Apocalypse

CamMag5.First Lines:
Ion blessis hom alle þat þis boke redenWit gode entent
                    and hor god dreden…
CamMag5.Last Lines:
…Þere to duelle euere in peesIn ioye & blis þat
                    neuer shal cees
CamMag5.Note:
Added by a later hand to front flyleaf, facing first page of Latin
                    Apocalypse.
CamMag5.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope,
                        ed.  
             Secular Lyrics of the XIV and XV Centuries.
         2nd ed. Oxford: Clarendon, 1955: 259-60.
